name: Anymal Flow Level 1
description:
**Animal Flow® Level 1 Workshops are where you’ll learn how to take your practice to the next level as well as how to properly coach others.**

Workshops are targeted toward fitness professionals who want to learn how to incorporate Animal Flow® into their own teaching, training, and coaching practices. This includes personal trainers, group fitness instructors, physical education teachers, coaches, yoga instructors, MMA trainers, and even physical therapists. Although only fitness professionals are eligible to become Certified Animal Flow Coaches, workshops are also open to fitness enthusiasts who just want to take their flow to the next level.


Animal Flow Level 1 is an intensive two-day workshop where you’ll master the moves, delve into the science behind Animal Flow®, and learn how to effectively use the practice with your own clients. You’ll cover all 6 elements of Animal Flow, including:

* Traveling Forms (the “ABCs” of animal movements)
* Switches and Transitions
* Wrist Mobility
* Activations
* Form Specific Stretches
* Flows

~~~~
You’ll learn much more than just mastering the movements though – you’ll learn to better understand integrated movement and bodyweight training. Most importantly, you will learn how to move better and the carry over will improve your performance (and your clients’ performance) no matter how you integrate Animal Flow into your training!
~~~~

The workshop includes both lecture and hands-on practice components. By the completion of the workshop you will have learned:

- The purpose and function of each Animal Flow® movement, along with the bio-mechanical processes involved.
- Understanding of how bodyweight training and Animal Flow® in particular, utilizes the Kinetic Chain.
- Benefits of quadrupedal movement.
- The correct way to perform each Animal Flow® movement, including how to cue and correct others.
- How to assess clients’ readiness for Animal Flow® movements and regress and progress the movements as needed.
- How to integrate Animal Flow® into overall fitness program design, including utilizing various components for dynamic warm-ups, interval training, circuit training, skills building, or as stand alone workouts.

https://www.canfitpro.com/application/themes/canfitpro/images/logo.jpg
This workshop is approved for 4 canfitpro Continuing Education Credits (CEC's): 4 PTS
